entries.source: Enjoying the plugin?
entries.translated: Enjoying the plugin?

entries.source: General
entries.translated: General

entries.source: General settings of the Advanced Canvas plugin.
entries.translated: General settings of the Advanced Canvas plugin.

entries.source: Node type on double click
entries.translated: Node type on double click

entries.source: The type of node that will be created when double clicking on the canvas.
entries.translated: The type of node that will be created when double clicking on the canvas.

entries.source: Always align new nodes to grid
entries.translated: Always align new nodes to grid

entries.source: When enabled, new nodes will be aligned to the grid.
entries.translated: When enabled, new nodes will be aligned to the grid.

entries.source: Default text node dimensions
entries.translated: Default text node dimensions

entries.source: The default dimensions of a text node.
entries.translated: The default dimensions of a text node.

entries.source: Default file node dimensions
entries.translated: Default file node dimensions

entries.source: The default dimensions of a file node.
entries.translated: The default dimensions of a file node.

entries.source: Minimum node size
entries.translated: Minimum node size

entries.source: The minimum size (either width or height) of a node.
entries.translated: The minimum size (either width or height) of a node.

entries.source: Maximum node width
entries.translated: Maximum node width

entries.source: The maximum width of a node. Set to -1 for no limit.
entries.translated: The maximum width of a node. Set to -1 for no limit.

entries.source: Disable font size relative to zoom
entries.translated: Disable font size relative to zoom

entries.source: When enabled, the font size of e.g. group node titles and edge labels will not increase when zooming out.
entries.translated: When enabled, the font size of e.g. group node titles and edge labels will not increase when zooming out.

entries.source: Extended commands
entries.translated: Extended commands

entries.source: Add more commands to the canvas.
entries.translated: Add more commands to the canvas.

entries.source: Zoom to cloned node
entries.translated: Zoom to cloned node

entries.source: When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the cloned node.
entries.translated: When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the cloned node.

entries.source: Clone node margin
entries.translated: Clone node margin

entries.source: The margin between the cloned node and the source node.
entries.translated: The margin between the cloned node and the source node.

entries.source: Expand node step size
entries.translated: Expand node step size

entries.source: The step size for expanding the node.
entries.translated: The step size for expanding the node.

entries.source: Enable .canvas metadata cache compatibility
entries.translated: Enable .canvas metadata cache compatibility

entries.source: Make .canvas files compatible with the backlinks and outgoing links feature and show the connections in the graph view.
entries.translated: Make .canvas files compatible with the backlinks and outgoing links feature and show the connections in the graph view.

entries.source: Treat edges between file nodes as links
entries.translated: Treat edges between file nodes as links

entries.source: When enabled, edges between file nodes will be treated as links. This means that if file node A.md has an edge to file node B.md in the canvas, file A.md will have a link to file B.md in the outgoing links section and show a connection in the graph view.
entries.translated: When enabled, edges between file nodes will be treated as links. This means that if file node A.md has an edge to file node B.md in the canvas, file A.md will have a link to file B.md in the outgoing links section and show a connection in the graph view.

entries.source: Enable support for linking to a node using a [[wikilink]]
entries.translated: Enable support for linking to a node using a [[wikilink]]

entries.source: When enabled, you can link and embed a node using [[canvas-file#node-id]].
entries.translated: When enabled, you can link and embed a node using [[canvas-file#node-id]].

entries.source: Native-like file search
entries.translated: Native-like file search

entries.source: When enabled, the file search will be done using the native Obsidian file search.
entries.translated: When enabled, the file search will be done using the native Obsidian file search.

entries.source: Auto file node edges
entries.translated: Auto file node edges

entries.source: Automatically create edges between file nodes based their frontmatter links.
entries.translated: Automatically create edges between file nodes based their frontmatter links.

entries.source: Frontmatter key name
entries.translated: Frontmatter key name

entries.source: The frontmatter key to fetch the outgoing edges from. (Keep the default to ensure best compatibility.)
entries.translated: The frontmatter key to fetch the outgoing edges from. (Keep the default to ensure best compatibility.)

entries.source: Portals
entries.translated: Portals

entries.source: Create portals to other canvases.
entries.translated: Create portals to other canvases.

entries.source: Show edges into disabled portals
entries.translated: Show edges into disabled portals

entries.source: When enabled, edges into disabled portals will be shown.
entries.translated: When enabled, edges into disabled portals will be shown.

entries.source: Collapsible groups
entries.translated: Collapsible groups

entries.source: Group nodes can be collapsed and expanded to keep the canvas organized.
entries.translated: Group nodes can be collapsed and expanded to keep the canvas organized.

entries.source: Collapsed group preview on drag
entries.translated: Collapsed group preview on drag

entries.source: When enabled, a group that is collapsed show its border while dragging a node.
entries.translated: When enabled, a group that is collapsed show its border while dragging a node.

entries.source: Combine custom styles
entries.translated: Combine custom styles

entries.source: Combine all style attributes of Advanced Canvas in a single dropdown.
entries.translated: Combine all style attributes of Advanced Canvas in a single dropdown.

entries.source: Node styling
entries.translated: Node styling

entries.source: Style your nodes with different shapes and borders.
entries.translated: Style your nodes with different shapes and borders.

entries.source: Custom node style settings
entries.translated: Custom node style settings

entries.source: Add custom style settings for nodes. (Go to GitHub for more information)
entries.translated: Add custom style settings for nodes. (Go to GitHub for more information)

entries.source: Open
entries.translated: Open

entries.source: Default text node color
entries.translated: Default text node color

entries.source: The default color of a text node. The default range is from 0 to 6, where 0 is no color. The range can be extended by using the Custom Colors feature of Advanced Canvas.
entries.translated: The default color of a text node. The default range is from 0 to 6, where 0 is no color. The range can be extended by using the Custom Colors feature of Advanced Canvas.

entries.source: Edges styling
entries.translated: Edges styling

entries.source: Style your edges with different path styles.
entries.translated: Style your edges with different path styles.

entries.source: Custom edge style settings
entries.translated: Custom edge style settings

entries.source: Add custom style settings for edges. (Go to GitHub for more information)
entries.translated: Add custom style settings for edges. (Go to GitHub for more information)

entries.source: Inherit edge color from node
entries.translated: Inherit edge color from node

entries.source: When creating a new edge by dragging from a node, the edge will inherit the color of the node it is dragged from.
entries.translated: When creating a new edge by dragging from a node, the edge will inherit the color of the node it is dragged from.

entries.source: Default edge color
entries.translated: Default edge color

entries.source: The default color of an edge. The default range is from 0 to 6, where 0 is no color. The range can be extended by using the Custom Colors feature of Advanced Canvas.
entries.translated: The default color of an edge. The default range is from 0 to 6, where 0 is no color. The range can be extended by using the Custom Colors feature of Advanced Canvas.

entries.source: Default edge line direction
entries.translated: Default edge line direction

entries.source: The default line direction of an edge.
entries.translated: The default line direction of an edge.

entries.source: Nondirectional
entries.translated: Nondirectional

entries.source: Unidirectional
entries.translated: Unidirectional

entries.source: Bidirectional
entries.translated: Bidirectional

entries.source: Update edge style while dragging (Can be very slow)
entries.translated: Update edge style while dragging (Can be very slow)

entries.source: When enabled, the edge style will be updated while dragging an edge.
entries.translated: When enabled, the edge style will be updated while dragging an edge.

entries.source: Square path rounded
entries.translated: Square path rounded

entries.source: When enabled, the square path's corners will be rounded.
entries.translated: When enabled, the square path's corners will be rounded.

entries.source: A* allow diagonal
entries.translated: A* allow diagonal

entries.source: When enabled, the A* path style will allow diagonal paths.
entries.translated: When enabled, the A* path style will allow diagonal paths.

entries.source: A* rounded path
entries.translated: A* rounded path

entries.source: When enabled, the A* path style will be rounded.
entries.translated: When enabled, the A* path style will be rounded.

entries.source: Floating edges (auto edge side)
entries.translated: Floating edges (auto edge side)

entries.source: Floating edges are automatically placed on the most suitable side of the node.
entries.translated: Floating edges are automatically placed on the most suitable side of the node.

entries.source: Allow floating edges creation
entries.translated: Allow floating edges creation

entries.source: Allow floating edges creation by dragging the edge over the target node without placing it over a specific side connection point. (If disabled, floating edges can only be created and used by other Advanced Canvas features.)
entries.translated: Allow floating edges creation by dragging the edge over the target node without placing it over a specific side connection point. (If disabled, floating edges can only be created and used by other Advanced Canvas features.)

entries.source: New edge from side floating
entries.translated: New edge from side floating

entries.source: When enabled, the "from" side of the edge will always be floating.
entries.translated: When enabled, the "from" side of the edge will always be floating.

entries.source: Flip edges
entries.translated: Flip edges

entries.source: Flip the direction of edges using the popup menu.
entries.translated: Flip the direction of edges using the popup menu.

entries.source: Presentations
entries.translated: Presentations

entries.source: Create a presentation from your canvas.
entries.translated: Create a presentation from your canvas.

entries.source: Show "Set Start Node" in node popup
entries.translated: Show "Set Start Node" in node popup

entries.source: If turned off, you can still set the start node using the corresponding command.
entries.translated: If turned off, you can still set the start node using the corresponding command.

entries.source: Default slide dimensions
entries.translated: Default slide dimensions

entries.source: The default dimensions of a slide.
entries.translated: The default dimensions of a slide.

entries.source: Wrap in slide padding
entries.translated: Wrap in slide padding

entries.source: The padding of the slide when wrapping the canvas in a slide.
entries.translated: The padding of the slide when wrapping the canvas in a slide.

entries.source: Reset viewport on presentation end
entries.translated: Reset viewport on presentation end

entries.source: When enabled, the viewport will be reset to the original position after the presentation ends.
entries.translated: When enabled, the viewport will be reset to the original position after the presentation ends.

entries.source: Use arrow keys to change slides
entries.translated: Use arrow keys to change slides

entries.source: When enabled, you can use the arrow keys to change slides in presentation mode.
entries.translated: When enabled, you can use the arrow keys to change slides in presentation mode.

entries.source: Use PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides
entries.translated: Use PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides

entries.source: When enabled, you can use the PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides in presentation mode (Makes the presentation mode compatible with most presentation remotes).
entries.translated: When enabled, you can use the PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides in presentation mode (Makes the presentation mode compatible with most presentation remotes).

entries.source: Zoom to slide without padding
entries.translated: Zoom to slide without padding

entries.source: When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the slide without padding.
entries.translated: When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the slide without padding.

entries.source: Use unclamped zoom while presenting
entries.translated: Use unclamped zoom while presenting

entries.source: When enabled, the zoom will not be clamped while presenting.
entries.translated: When enabled, the zoom will not be clamped while presenting.

entries.source: Enter fullscreen while presenting
entries.translated: Enter fullscreen while presenting

entries.source: When enabled, presentations automatically request fullscreen. Disable to keep Obsidian windowed during presentations.
entries.translated: When enabled, presentations automatically request fullscreen. Disable to keep Obsidian windowed during presentations.

entries.source: Slide transition animation duration
entries.translated: Slide transition animation duration

entries.source: The duration of the slide transition animation in seconds. Set to 0 to disable the animation.
entries.translated: The duration of the slide transition animation in seconds. Set to 0 to disable the animation.

entries.source: Slide transition animation intensity
entries.translated: Slide transition animation intensity

entries.source: The intensity of the slide transition animation. The higher the value, the more the canvas will zoom out before zooming in on the next slide.
entries.translated: The intensity of the slide transition animation. The higher the value, the more the canvas will zoom out before zooming in on the next slide.

entries.source: Z ordering controls
entries.translated: Z ordering controls

entries.source: Change the persistent z-index of nodes using the context menu.
entries.translated: Change the persistent z-index of nodes using the context menu.

entries.source: Show one layer shift options
entries.translated: Show one layer shift options

entries.source: When enabled, you can move nodes one layer forward or backward.
entries.translated: When enabled, you can move nodes one layer forward or backward.

entries.source: Aspect ratio control
entries.translated: Aspect ratio control

entries.source: Change the aspect ratio of nodes using the context menu.
entries.translated: Change the aspect ratio of nodes using the context menu.

entries.source: Variable breakpoint
entries.translated: Variable breakpoint

entries.source: Change the zoom breakpoint (the zoom level at which the nodes won't render their content anymore) on a per-node basis using the --variable-breakpoint CSS variable.
entries.translated: Change the zoom breakpoint (the zoom level at which the nodes won't render their content anymore) on a per-node basis using the --variable-breakpoint CSS variable.

entries.source: Auto resize node
entries.translated: Auto resize node

entries.source: Automatically resize the height of a node to fit the content.
entries.translated: Automatically resize the height of a node to fit the content.

entries.source: Enable auto resize by default
entries.translated: Enable auto resize by default

entries.source: When enabled, the auto resize feature will be enabled by default for all nodes.
entries.translated: When enabled, the auto resize feature will be enabled by default for all nodes.

entries.source: Max height
entries.translated: Max height

entries.source: The maximum height of the node when auto resizing (-1 for unlimited).
entries.translated: The maximum height of the node when auto resizing (-1 for unlimited).

entries.source: Snap to grid
entries.translated: Snap to grid

entries.source: When enabled, the height of the node will snap to the grid.
entries.translated: When enabled, the height of the node will snap to the grid.

entries.source: Canvas encapsulation
entries.translated: Canvas encapsulation

entries.source: Encapsulate a selection of nodes and edges into a new canvas using the context menu.
entries.translated: Encapsulate a selection of nodes and edges into a new canvas using the context menu.

entries.source: Better readonly
entries.translated: Better readonly

entries.source: Improve the readonly mode.
entries.translated: Improve the readonly mode.

entries.source: Hide background grid when in readonly
entries.translated: Hide background grid when in readonly

entries.source: When enabled, the background grid will be hidden when in readonly mode.
entries.translated: When enabled, the background grid will be hidden when in readonly mode.

entries.source: Edge highlight
entries.translated: Edge highlight

entries.source: Highlight outgoing (and optionally incoming) edges of a selected node.
entries.translated: Highlight outgoing (and optionally incoming) edges of a selected node.

entries.source: Highlight incoming edges
entries.translated: Highlight incoming edges

entries.source: When enabled, incoming edges will also be highlighted.
entries.translated: When enabled, incoming edges will also be highlighted.

entries.source: Edge selection
entries.translated: Edge selection

entries.source: Select edges connected to the selected node(s) using the popup menu.
entries.translated: Select edges connected to the selected node(s) using the popup menu.

entries.source: Select edge by direction
entries.translated: Select edge by direction

entries.source: Select incoming or outgoing edges using separate popup menu items.
entries.translated: Select incoming or outgoing edges using separate popup menu items.

entries.source: Focus mode
entries.translated: Focus mode

entries.source: Focus on a single node and blur all other nodes.
entries.translated: Focus on a single node and blur all other nodes.
